title: Policy Officer
text:
23rd September 2015 
Fixed-term 1 year contract 
The Wellcome Trust is a global charitable foundation dedicated to improving health. We support bright minds in science, the humanities and the social sciences, as well as education, public engagement and the application of research to medicine. 
The Policy team works to influence policy discussions to ensure researchers can be as effective as possible and to help achieve the Trust’s mission. We work with a wide range of partners internally and externally to ensure a strong environment for biomedical science and to enhance the way research is done. 
We’re looking for a policy officer to join the team, with a focus on the research base, translation and innovation. 
This role will involve: undertaking in-depth research and analysis preparing high-quality briefing papers and policy documents for a wide range of stakeholders building and maintaining relationships with partners. 
To be successful, you will need to have: a degree in a relevant discipline experience working in a policy environment, preferably with a biomedical research or health focus knowledge and understanding of the research and innovation process excellent analytical and report-writing skills the ability to communicate and influence at all levels. 
You will be an enthusiastic team player with strong communication and organisational skills and have a track record of working proactively. 
We offer a competitive salary of c.£29,000 per year (depending on experience), plus excellent benefits. 
To apply, submit a CV and a covering letter explaining how you meet the criteria for this post. For more information and to apply online, visit: wellcome.ac.uk/jobs 
Application deadline: 23 September 2015 
Interviews: 7 October 2015
